sentences.sContent: The modern decor strikes a discordant note in this old building.
sentences.sCn: 现代化的装潢与这座古老的建筑本身很不协调。

synos.tran: 不和谐的，刺耳的；不一致的

words.tran: 不一致；不调和；冲突；（声音的）不和谐

trans.tranCn: 不调和的, 不和的, [乐]不悦耳的, 不和谐的
trans.tranOther: a discord-ant sound is unpleasant because it is made up of musical notes that do not go together well
